channel.title: Slight Oversight - SPAS-12
channel.description:
I noticed that the world model of the SPAS-12 has the fold-able stock equipped like in earlier iterations while the view model doesn't.
![](upload://4z5G2IZt5wOwviENunvdlKHFy6w.png)

item.title: Slight Oversight - SPAS-12
item.dc:creator: lunertexcosmo
item.description:
Double Post. My bad. Was trying to report a glitch and accidentally replied to this thread. As you can see from the title…

Here’s the thread I attempted to originally make: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=504156#post504156
